item.title: Salalah Travel Guide (Dhofar/Oman/Middle East/Asia)
item.description: Explore the natural beauty, rich culture, and adventurous activities of Salalah, Oman with our complete travel guide.

item.title: Bushkill Falls Travel Guide (Pocono Mountains/Northeastern Pennsylvania/Pennsylvania/Mid-Atlantic/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Plan your trip to Bushkill Falls with our helpful guide that includes recommendations on places to visit, hiking and biking routes, activities and tours, food and drinks, where to stay, local culture, safety, transportation options and more.

item.title: Magboro Travel Guide (Ogun State/South West Nigeria/Nigeria/West Africa/Africa)
item.description: Explore the culturally rich and naturally beautiful town of Magboro with our comprehensive travel guide. Discover the best places to visit, things to do, where to stay, what to eat, and more.

item.title: Ikeda (Osaka) Travel Guide (Osaka (prefecture)/Kansai/Japan/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Plan a trip to Ikeda (Osaka), Japan with this comprehensive travel guide. Discover the best places to visit, things to do, where to stay, local culture, safety tips, and more.

item.title: Langzhong Travel Guide (East Sichuan/Sichuan/Southwest China/China/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Travel to Langzhong, Sichuan, China, and experience the cultural and natural attractions, delicious food, and unique local products. Our week-long itinerary, hiking and biking routes, and transportation options, make planning your trip hassle-free.

item.title: Taymyria Travel Guide (Krasnoyarsk Krai/Siberia/Russia/Eastern Europe/Europe)
item.description: Plan a trip to Taymyria, Siberia using this comprehensive travel guide that includes information on where to go, what to do, and how to get around in this remote region of Russia.

item.title: Trapani Travel Guide (Trapani (province)/Sicily/Italy/Europe)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, food and drink scene, where to stay, cultural customs, and transport options in Trapani, Sicily.

item.title: Cortes Island Travel Guide (Discovery Islands/Vancouver Island/British Columbia/Canada/North America)
item.description: Planning a trip to Cortes Island? This comprehensive travel guide covers where to stay, what to do, and how to get around in this beautiful island destination. Read on for a detailed itinerary, hiking and bike routes, food and drink scene, cultural attractions, safety tips, and more.

item.title: New Hazelton Travel Guide (North Coast-Nechako/Northern British Columbia/British Columbia/Canada/North America)
item.description: Explore the culturally-rich and scenic town of New Hazelton in Northern British Columbia, Canada with this comprehensive travel guide. Discover its natural attractions, hiking and biking routes, local culture and customs, food scene, and more.

item.title: Korea Travel Guide (East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit in Korea, from culturally important historical sites to natural attractions and more. This guide offers tips on hiking and biking routes, must-try local dishes, places to stay, and the best time to visit.
